Package sportstournament.main

Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
sportstournament.main.RandomEvent
public class RandomEvent extends Object
This class implements a RandomEvent. While the team is resting (taking a bye) there is a chance that random events can occur. The chance they occur depend on the difficulty.
Author:
Isaac Steele and Reuben Schoonbee

    • randomAthleteBoost

      public void randomAthleteBoost()
      Randomly chooses an athlete and boosts their stats.

    • getQuitChance

      public int getQuitChance()
      Returns an integer which represents the chance an Athlete quits. The chance is higher if the athlete is injured.
      Returns:
      The chance that an athlete quits

    • randomAthleteQuits

      public void randomAthleteQuits()
      Removes a random Athlete from the team. The Athlete has more of a chance to get removed if they are injured.

    • getAthleteJoinChance

      public int getAthleteJoinChance()
      Returns an integer representing the chance a random athlete joins. The chances increase depending on the number of free slots in the reserves.
      Returns:
      The chance that an athlete joins

    • randomAthleteJoins

      public void randomAthleteJoins()
      A random Athlete joins the reserves of the Club

    • doRandomEvent

      public String doRandomEvent(String difficulty)
      Each random event has a chance to occur, but only one can happen each week. A string is returned reflecting what random event occurred.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty of the game. It affects the chances of a random event to occur
      Returns:
      A string reflecting what random event occurred.
